name: Dettol Skincare Bodywash (Free Loofah)
description:
Current Promotional Period: 19-Feb-2025 To 18-Mar-2025*Based on Stock**It might not be valid for all Cities Highlights  ● Dettol’s trusted germ protection with Rose & Sakura blossom  ● Keeps your skin feeling healthy and soft  ● 8 Hour long lasting moisture  ● pH-balanced formula with no TCC & Triclosan  ● Dermatologically tested  Description  Dettol Skincare bodywash combines Dettol’s trusted germ protection with Sakura Blossom fragrance to give you 8-hour moisture and leaves your skin feeling healthy and soft. Dettol gives you better germ protection versus non-antibacterial products, as tested against bacteria. It has a pH-balanced formulation with no TCC & Triclosan and has been dermatologically tested.  Usage Direction: For the best lather, place a small amount of Dettol shower gel onto a shower puff or your palm and massage onto your body then rinse with water.   Safety Direction: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children unless under adult supervision. Not to be used for children under 3 years of age. Avoid direct contact with eyes. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water. If persistent irritation occurs, get medical attention. Store in a cool and dry place.   About the Manufacturer: Dettol Body Wash is made in Bangladesh by Reckitt Benckiser Bangladesh PLC. Dettol is a registered Trademark of Reckitt Benckiser PLC headquartered in England. The first Dettol product was manufactured in the year 1932 in England. Dettol is now the world’s most trusted germ kill brand.

name: Palmolive Body Wash Absolute Relaxing
description:
Our Palmolive Absolute Relax shower gel contains a perfect blend of  natural Ylang Ylang Essential Oil and Iris Extracts to provide you with the essence of a blissful shower moment any time! Free of Parabens & Silicones. Pour a little of our body wash onto a loofah or wet cloth. Squeeze to create lather.
Our Palmolive Absolute Relax shower gel contains a perfect blend of  natural Ylang Ylang Essential Oil and Iris Extracts to provide you with the essence of a blissful shower moment any time! Free of Parabens & Silicones. Pour a little of our body wash onto a loofah or wet cloth. Squeeze to create lather.

name: Palmolive Body Wash Morning Boost
description:
• SOOTHING FRAGRANCE: From enchanting your senses with its pleasant aroma to cleansing, our beautifully fragrant body wash transforms every shower into a soothing experience reconnecting you with nature. Unveil the new you every blissful shower moment.  • RELAX AND UNWIND: The desire to feel clean and fresh is important to everyone. Our Palmolive Aroma Morning Boost shower gel cleanses your body, makes you relax, and leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth for a hygienic experience and brilliant beauty all day.  • 100 PERCENT NATURAL OILS AND EXTRACTS: Palmolive Aroma Morning Boost shower gel contains a perfect blend of 100 percent natural Citrus Essential Oil and Lemongrass extracts to provide you with the essence of a blissful shower moment any time! Free of Parabens and Silicones. • HOW TO USE: Pour a little of our body wash onto a loofah or wet cloth. Squeeze to create a lather. Apply all over your body, cleanse, and rinse off for a clean and refreshing feeling. For the best results, use a loofah to work up a rich and fragrant lather.  • COMMITED TO NATURE: We care for our planet as much as we do for you. Our bodywash formula is gently crafted to care for your skin, leaving it feeling soft and loved. That’s why we’re committed to using carefully selected and responsibly sourced ingredients.
• SOOTHING FRAGRANCE: From enchanting your senses with its pleasant aroma to cleansing, our beautifully fragrant body wash transforms every shower into a soothing experience reconnecting you with nature. Unveil the new you every blissful shower moment. 
 • RELAX AND UNWIND: The desire to feel clean and fresh is important to everyone. Our Palmolive Aroma Morning Boost shower gel cleanses your body, makes you relax, and leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth for a hygienic experience and brilliant beauty all day. 
 • 100 PERCENT NATURAL OILS AND EXTRACTS: Palmolive Aroma Morning Boost shower gel contains a perfect blend of 100 percent natural Citrus Essential Oil and Lemongrass extracts to provide you with the essence of a blissful shower moment any time! Free of Parabens and Silicones.
 • HOW TO USE: Pour a little of our body wash onto a loofah or wet cloth. Squeeze to create a lather. Apply all over your body, cleanse, and rinse off for a clean and refreshing feeling. For the best results, use a loofah to work up a rich and fragrant lather. 
 • COMMITED TO NATURE: We care for our planet as much as we do for you. Our bodywash formula is gently crafted to care for your skin, leaving it feeling soft and loved. That’s why we’re committed to using carefully selected and responsibly sourced ingredients.

name: Palmolive Body Wash Luminous Oils
description:
Palmolive Luminous Oils Shower Gel is a premium body wash infused with natural fig oil and white orchid extracts. It provides a luxurious cleansing experience, gently moisturizing the skin while leaving it soft, smooth, and delicately fragranced. The product is soap-free, pH-balanced, and dermatologist-tested, making it suitable for all skin types. Ingredients: Natural Fig Oil: Known for its moisturizing properties.White Orchid Extracts: Offers hydration and soothing benefits.Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Citric Acid, and fragrance compounds such as Benzyl Salicylate and Hexyl Cinnamal​. How to Use: Apply a small amount of shower gel to a loofah, sponge, or directly onto your skin. Work into a rich lather and gently massage all over the body. Rinse thoroughly with water. Use daily for soft, rejuvenated skin.
Palmolive Luminous Oils Shower Gel is a premium body wash infused with natural fig oil and white orchid extracts. It provides a luxurious cleansing experience, gently moisturizing the skin while leaving it soft, smooth, and delicately fragranced. The product is soap-free, pH-balanced, and dermatologist-tested, making it suitable for all skin types.
 
Ingredients: Natural Fig Oil: Known for its moisturizing properties.
White Orchid Extracts: Offers hydration and soothing benefits.
Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Citric Acid, and fragrance compounds such as Benzyl Salicylate and Hexyl Cinnamal​.
 
How to Use: Apply a small amount of shower gel to a loofah, sponge, or directly onto your skin. Work into a rich lather and gently massage all over the body. Rinse thoroughly with water. Use daily for soft, rejuvenated skin.

name: Nivea Female Shower Gel Lemongrass & Oil
description:
Origin: Thailand• Tempting freshness meets pampering care. • Moisturizes better than soap. • pH skin balanced and skin compatibility dermatologically approved. How To Use:Step 1 - Soak a loofah in water. Step 2 - Pour a coin sized amount of the shower gel.Step 3 - Work into a rich lather, gently rub on moist skin. Step 4 - Rinse the skin and towel dry.
Origin: Thailand

name: Lux Body Wash Bright Camellia
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from India. Elevate your daily shower routine with Lux Body Wash Bright Camellia, a luxurious and indulgent bath experience captured in a 500 ml bottle. Lux, a brand synonymous with beauty and elegance, brings you this exquisite body wash infused with the radiant scent of camellia blossoms. Pamper your skin and senses as you cleanse, moisturize, and envelop yourself in the delicate fragrance of blooming camellias.
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from India.
